name: Procedure to register child support order of foreign country for modification ARTICLE 7. SUPPORT PROCEEDING UNDER CONVENTION
text: §576B-616  Procedure to register child support order of foreign country for modification.  A party or support enforcement agency seeking to modify, or to modify and enforce, a foreign child support order not under the Convention may register that order in this State under sections 576B-601 through 576B-608 if the order has not been registered.  A petition for modification may be filed at the same time as a request for registration, or at another time.  The petition shall specify the grounds for modification. [L 2015, c 77, pt of §1]
